title: Defend It and Hope (4C115)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] Man to wound a minion once (or twice if that minion is an Uruk-hai).
Lore:	”'Is it not said that no foe has ever taken the Hornburg, if men defended it?'”
Rarity:	C
